ygData.subject: RE: Re: lvl 29 pet spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, My gnome is my lev 18 magician. I took my magician to buy 2 copies of the lev 29 pet spell. I then gave the 2 copies to a lev 28 necro friend and
ygData.messageBody:
Actually,

My gnome is my lev 18 magician. I took my magician to buy 2 copies of the
lev 29 pet spell. I then gave the 2 copies to a lev 28 necro friend and
switched chars back to my necromancer. My friend then game me a copy of the
spell and paid for the other one.

It sucks to have to use a character as a mule, but it got the job done fast.

Mortifer



From: "Skel the Necromancer" <mata_eq@...>

Did you buy it w/ your Gnome Necro? Weren't you KOS?

----- Original Message -----
From: Murphy, Kenneth E. <MurphyK@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 2:16 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: lvl 29 pet spell


> From: "Murphy, Kenneth E." <MurphyK@...>
>
> Hail.
>
> Just a reminder. They will always have the pet spells for level 29 and
below
> somewhere for sale in the game as shadow knights need them and they do not
> get research. So there will always be a non research way to get them in
> game. I had my gnome buy my lev 29 pet a few days ago and it cost him 18
> platinum and some change and was in the OOT on the high elf vendor that
wont
> sell to a necromancer.
>
>
> Sincerely,
>
> Mortifer - MoltenLava
>
> AKA - Eloric D'Mortifer - Necromancer Rank 8
> - Veneficus - Magician Rank 5
> - Mortifer - Wizard Rank 3
